body: First Ladies of Africa, you have failed us!:"As Africans, we know of our individual First Ladies. It is either their eccentricities, extravagance or total lack of decorum that reminds us of their continued presence."
original_body: First Ladies of Africa, you have failed us!:"As Africans, we know of our individual First Ladies. It is either their eccentricities, extravagance or total lack of decorum that reminds us of their continued presence."
title: Africa: Dear First Ladies of Africa
